#summary Basic guide on how to setup MapServer and MapCache. Not BDRS specific.

= Installation steps for Linux (no fast cgi) =

1. Install MapServer using apt-get
2. Put your MapServer config file into your cgi-lib directory. By default it is in /usr/lib/cgi-bin. The mapserv executable cgi script should also be in this directory.
3. Add the google projection to your epsg file in /usr/share/proj/epsg

<code>
# Google projection
<900913> +proj=merc +a=6378137 +b=6378137 +lat_ts=0.0 +lon_0=0.0 +x_0=0.0 
+y_0=0 +k=1.0 +units=m +nadgrids=@null +no_defs <>
</code>
